title: The Difference Between Belief and Delusion | Tom Bilyeu AMA
description: Tom answers questions from the community. Subscribe to our channel: http://bit.ly/2EpxC6D Tom Bilyeu AMA’s are Live on Facebook and YouTube every Friday at 10 am PST. You can submit your questions in advance to connect@impacttheory.com, with the subject line “AMA Question”.
